function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inaccurate regulation of uv-c system power output","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Failure to monitor uv-c system operating hours and power output","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreasing efficiency of uv-c system due to lamp degradation, air temperature, dust pollution, and reflective surface degradation.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreasing efficiency of uv-c system due to lamp degradation and environmental factors.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential exposure to uv-c radiation for maintenance personnel or occupants if not properly shielded or turned off during maintenance.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate maintenance of uv-c system leading to reduced disinfection effectiveness.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poorly designed uv-c system leading to uneven radiation distribution and ineffective disinfection.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Pathogens transmitted through the air","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Variety of pathogens sensitive to uv-c radiation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence of inactivation rate on pathogen type and environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffectiveness of uv-c radiation at disinfecting transported air in central air handling units","category":"Public health
